product_name: Drunk ElephantBaby Bar Travel Duo with Case
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's Baby Bar Travel Duo features two innovative, fragrance-free bars that behave like mild liquid cleansers on skin - leaving no residue behind. Have bars, will travel.
details: DetailsBenefitsMild cleansing bars that leave no residue behindPekee Bar clarifies, balances, and moisturizesJuju Bar deeply cleanses and subtly exfoliatesEasily removes grime and makeupSuitable for all skinBright, durable case makes them perfect for travel (which, by they way, they love to do)Cruelty-freeFormulated WithoutMade without the Suspicious 6 - the six ingredients Drunk Elephant believes are at the root of almost every skin issue (Essential oils, Silicones, Chemical sunscreens, SLS, Fragrances + dyes, and Drying alcohols)IncludesTravel-size Pekee Bar (1.0 oz)Travel-size Juju Bar (1.0 oz)Item 2588463How To UseWet Pekee Bar and lather until creamy. With your hands, massage over face, neck, and chest. Rinse well with warm water and pat dry.Wet Juju Bar and lather until creamy. With your hands, massage over face, neck, and chest. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use 2 or 3 times per week. Do not apply bar directly to skin.IngredientsJuju Bar, 1.0 oz Ingredients: Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bambusa Vulgaris Leaf/Stem Extract, Paraffin, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Heilmoor Clay, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract. Pekee Bar, 1.0 oz Ingredients: Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Paraffin, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Honey/Mel/Miel, Glycerin, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wet Pekee Bar and lather until creamy. With your hands, massage over face, neck, and chest. Rinse well with warm water and pat dry.Wet Juju Bar and lather until creamy. With your hands, massage over face, neck, and chest. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use 2 or 3 times per week. Do not apply bar directly to skin.
ingredients: Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract. Pekee Bar

reviews.headline: ❤️LOVE❤️
reviews.comments: I love these trsvel bars! The juju bar feels sooooooo nice on my skin! After using, my face feels soooooo soft! Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Only tried the Pekee
reviews.comments: My skin is dry and even most products that say they're for dry skin don't cut it—and that was before I started using tret. I'm forever seeking a non-drying but effectively cleaning face cleanser. This was drying after one use and from experience I know it will cumulatively dry me out over time, so I'm stopping with the one try. Based on that, I'm assuming the Juju will be too harsh for me. If your skin isn't very dry, but more towards the normal side of dry, this might be good for you. No scent, effective cleansing, soft sort of creamy lather. Little case is cute and I'm sure would be handy if I weren't returning.

reviews.headline: Best sensitive skin face wash
reviews.comments: If you were to buy one product from this brand let it be this facial bar duo. I have extremely sensitve acne prone skin and this face wash has never made me break out. They are small but last way longer than I expected them to. The full size versions of these bars take forever to go through even when used 2x a day. They also don't leave skin with the typical bar soap feel of being tacky/ dry.

reviews.headline: Cute and smells good
reviews.comments: it is very practical and cute it smells heavenly

reviews.headline: Perfect for travel
reviews.comments: These bars are perfect for travel, especially international travel. They're small, lightweight, and not a liquid. They're gentle enough to use when they aren't my regular facial cleanser. I use them at night, let them dry in the opened case, and they're ready to pack up in the morning. I've been using these for years.  I can't believe these don't get more attention.

reviews.headline: Fabulous duo!
reviews.comments: I've always dealt with skin sensitivity but for some unknown reason, at 35 years old, I woke up one morning and my skin had decided to reject everything I'd ever used. The Hyaluronic acid serum I'd used for months suddenly caused chemical burns, my skin was peeling, breaking out, and looked horrific—and no one could tell me why. (Still can't, actually) I wound up ordering Drunk Elephant's Baby Bar Travel Duo as a shot in the dark. Not only did my skin handle these bars, it LOVED them. My skin started to clear up within a couple of days after using these DE bars. I love how neither of these strip my skin of its natural oils—they're also fragrance free, for those of you who also battle sensitivity, and last a long time! I bought my duo in May, use one of the two bars every single day, twice a day, and they still haven't run out! I ordered the full sized bars to replace them a few weeks ago but they're still going strong! They might be small, but they're powerful. One full sized bar will fit inside of the travel case so that's reusable too :) Drunk Elephant has helped keep my sensitivity at bay while working to effectively target all of my skin concerns, so while they are definitely pricier than other brands, I find them to be worth it. I certainly have no intentions of switching!

reviews.headline: Not hyped enough!
reviews.comments: In the midst of me having an ongoing allergic reaction to another brand I went back to my basics which is Drunk Elephant. I decided to give these bars a try to see if it would help my face recover from the allergic reaction I was having. I cannot rave enough about these bars! They are so great for sensitive skin or skin that has been damaged. These give you a nice clean feeling without too much exfoliation and stripping of the skin. I will forever add these to my collection. My only complaint would be the size… I mean they are travel size but still rather small. That's okay though! The product itself definitely gets 5 stars.

faceoff_positive.comments: This is another one of my favorites and I keep this one in the shower to exfoliate my skin and then use smooth it out with the white soap. It's comes on very creamy and light and leaves my skin feeling refreshed and super smooth without leaving breakouts.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it!!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: My skin is dry and even most products that say they're for dry skin don't cut it—and that was before I started using tret. I'm forever seeking a non-drying but effectively cleaning face cleanser. This was drying after one use and from experience I know it will cumulatively dry me out over time, so I'm stopping with the one try. Based on that, I'm assuming the Juju will be too harsh for me. If your skin isn't very dry, but more towards the normal side of dry, this might be good for you. No scent, effective cleansing, soft sort of creamy lather. Little case is cute and I'm sure would be handy if I weren't returning.
faceoff_negative.headline: Only tried the Pekee
